name: WhatsAlexa
description: WhatsAlexa is a Helper WhatsApp Bot Written By @TOXIC-DEVIL with Baileys. Alexa has a lot of Features/Commans Including Voice Chat [ AI ].

ALEXA_SESSION.description: Enter the copied SESSION here ( Copied code starting with Alexa===eyJj & ending with 9In0= ).

SUDO.description: It gives all the privileges to the users. => 91xxx,0,91xxx,0,91xxx...

LANGUAGE.description: Bot languages. Malayalam => ML, Indonesia => ID, English => EN ( Enter any one only )

HANDLERS.description: Symbol used infront of a command ( Prefix ). NOTE : ONLY SYMBOL CAN BE USED, DON'T ENTER ANY OTHER LATIN WORDS / ALPHABETS, IF IT HAPPENS BOT WILL NOT WORK.

OWNER_NAME.description: Enter the owner name, You must enter your name ( This name will be shown on some commands )

AUTO_BIO.description: Duruma otomatik tarih ve zaman eklemek için true yapın. Set true for auto date, time in biography.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 919xxxx && 917xxxx-1xxx or 915xxxx,919xxx...

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter the owner number, You must enter your number, Please don't enter the number with country code ( example : 91 for indian ) Also don't enter space & + on the number ( example : 91996132xxxx for indian ). ( This number will be shown on some commands )

SEND_READ.description: The bot reads the incoming messages ( only commands sent by others so privacy is not breaking there ).

HEROKU.description: Type 'true' Iff the bot is running in  Heroku Else type 'false'.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Enter your heroku api key [ You can get it from here : https://dashboard.heroku.com/account Scroll down to end, click reveal button & Copy the API KEY ].

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: WhatsAlexa Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot.

BOT_PRESENCE.description: Type the Presence of bot, presences: online => Always Shows the online, offline => Always Shows offline, typing => Always Shows typing, recording => Always Shows recording.. NOTE : THE PRESENCE WILL BE PERMANENT, UNTIL THE BOT IS ALIVE / RUNNING / WORKING

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Re-Enter the heroku app name. [ Same name which you have entered on 'app-name' ( above )].

DEBUG.description: For Developers => all, info, warn, fatal, error, debug, off

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Ban Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.
